comment.body:
> 漢字の書くは自分ができない (kanji no kaku wa dzibun ga dekinai)

@caryoscelus: 肝心(kanjin)の(な)核は自分(以外)ができない The important core (part) is not other thing but ourselves. 理解失敗 f(^_^;
@caryoscelus: shikashi means "however", so from the beginning I was guessing that you disagreed my statement..

> 漢字が大事

@caryoscelus: 多分。Romajiだけnihongoはたくさんambiguityがいる (Mandarin would have more ambiguity.. but for Hokkien it's ok and you can see someone is [posting Hokkien in latin](?Post/1SunAWK2VUT9GQK32MpwRfFPVgcBSJN9a/1CmmSnd99UGinNpZ6FMAxPXSf973S253Pr/1520933072) here

> So that "shikashi"-phrase was badly-phrased self-irony.

@caryoscelus: Well, obviously I'm not a good Japanese user either. I can read and listen a lot, but likely make many mistakes, and I don't care much about grammar :P

@caryoscelus: for point 1, agree, but the free network (esp. the ads system behind it) is also causing serious problems. For point 2, filter them all, do opensource and unregulatable business instead.. For point 3, yep, wish one day we don't need any religion any more.
For me I am/have been doing some offline teaching job/work recently.
@caryoscelus: [what]: high school level maths, physics, chemistry, etc. [who]: some high school students. More like coaching than teaching exactly.

```
$ en sudo pacman -Rnds ocaml-compiler-libs ocaml
checking dependencies...
:: brltty optionally requires ocaml: OCaml support
:: graphviz optionally requires ocaml: ocaml bindings

Packages (2) ocaml-4.11.1-1  ocaml-compiler-libs-4.11.1-1

Total Removed Size:  413.28 MiB

:: Do you want to remove these packages? [Y/n] ^C
```

> ( note that python in post refers to python2 )

@caryoscelus: ah! I see. Python2 went end of life one year ago, I deleted python2 and all related packages at that time. But you still kept it for almost one more year ^_^
